Title: Vacheron and Constantin Solid 18K White Gold Art Deco Pocketwatch
Description: Vacheron & Constantin 18K White Gold Pocketwatch Stunning & all original Vacheron & Constantin in solid 18K White Gold! Ultra-slim 18K Gold case measures 44.41mm across without the crown or bow. It’s signed Vacheron & Constantin inside the caseback, and is stamped 18K Gold inside the caseback, the lip of the case, crown, and at the bow. The watch features a beautiful hand engraving, also on the inside of the case. The high polish case back was never engraved. The silver dial finish is all-original and features a textured, contrasting silver subdial. It also features original applied white gold markers and matching Breguet hands. Resting over the dial is the watch’s original glass crystal. The watch is powered by a Vacheron & Constantin Swiss movement with 18 jewels, marked adjusted to 8 positions. Truly outstanding in its design and quality. Running strong, and keeping good time. Please view photos carefully before purchasing, as photos are a part of the description.
